summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from May 1, 2016, to May 31, 2016. It details significant outgoing transfers, including large sums transferred to various financial institutions, and provides information on interest earned during the period.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to FirstBank Puerto Rico
events.description: A transfer of $200,000.00 was made to FirstBank Puerto Rico.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Morgan Stanley
events.description: A transfer of $1,100,000.00 was made to Morgan Stanley.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Northern Trust International Banking Corp
events.description: A transfer of $20,000,000.00 was made to Northern Trust International Banking Corp.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $10,276.18 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $582,175,213.15 on May 1, 2016.
The account experienced significant outgoing transfers totaling $21,300,000.00 during May 2016.
The account earned an interest payment of $10,276.18 during the statement period.
No service charges or overdraft fees were incurred during this statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
